name: PAT_ENC_8
description: This table supplements the PAT_ENC, PAT_ENC_2, PAT_ENC_3, PAT_ENC_4, PAT_ENC_5, PAT_ENC_6, and PAT_ENC_7 tables. It contains additional information related to patient encounters or appointments.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: EST_PREPAY_CALC_PP_PROPOSED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient was offered an estimated payment plan for this visit ('Y'). 'N' or NULL indicates that the patient was not offered an estimated payment plan for this visit.

columns.name: EST_PREPAY_CALC_ELIG_C_NAME
columns.description: The eligibility for remaining balances category ID for the payment plan associated with this visit.

columns.name: PMT_PLAN_AGRMT_SCHED_PMT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the payment plan agreement created from this visit's pre-service sign up.

columns.name: RSLT_FOL_UP_CREAT_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: Contains the source workflow which created the Results Follow-Up encounter.

columns.name: BILL_DECIS_FIN_ASST_TRACKER_ID
columns.description: The ID of the decision for which this encounter is used to generate charges. This is set only by an automated process that requires the decision service grid to function.
